publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4971 Robert Brown: Celebrating 125 Years of Putting CHILDREN 1st—That the Parliament congratulates CHILDREN 1st on its 125th anniversary; notes that CHILDREN 1st is the working name of the Royal Scottish Society for Prevention of Cruelty to Children, an organisation that works with children, young people and their families; applauds the organisation on its long contribution to the welfare of children in Scotland, and wishes retiring Chairperson Rev Bill Brown well after 39 years’ involvement with the organisation.

S3M-4971 Celebrating 125 Years of Putting CHILDREN 1st (lodged on 2 October 2009) Liam McArthur*, Maureen Watt*, Jamie McGrigor*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jim Hume*, Mike Pringle*, Christine Grahame*, Karen Whitefield*, Jim Tolson*, Aileen Campbell*, Bob Doris*, Jackie Baillie*, Ross Finnie*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Patrick Harvie*

S3M-4971 Celebrating 125 Years of Putting CHILDREN 1st (lodged on 2 October 2009) Bill Wilson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Sandra White*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Jamie Hepburn*, Iain Smith*, Michael Matheson*, Mary Mulligan*, John Wilson*, Robin Harper*, Elaine Murray*, Trish Godman*
S3M-4971 Celebrating 125 Years of Putting CHILDREN 1st (lodged on 2 October 2009) Rhoda Grant*, Bill Kidd*, Tom McCabe*, Jack McConnell*
S3M-4971 Celebrating 125 Years of Putting CHILDREN 1st (lodged on 2 October 2009) Anne McLaughlin*, Gil Paterson*, Sarah Boyack*
S3M-4971 Celebrating 125 Years of Putting CHILDREN 1st (lodged on 2 October 2009) Dave Thompson*, Hugh Henry*
S3M-4971 Celebrating 125 Years of Putting CHILDREN 1st (lodged on 2 October 2009) Linda Fabiani*
S3M-4971 Celebrating 125 Years of Putting CHILDREN 1st (lodged on 2 October 2009) Marlyn Glen*
